noun.definition: A session of vigorous physical exercise or training.
noun.example: She does a daily workout at the gym.

noun.definition: A test of one's ability, endurance, or tolerance.
noun.example: The steep hill gave the car a real workout.

verb.definition: To engage in a workout; to exercise (informal).

usage_examples: I had a great workout this morning.
This is a good workout for your legs.
